title: detectivestwy
body:
D: How could someone do this to a lady! The child was found lying beside his mother when police arrived.
-> Do we know how she died?
    D: Death resulting from repeated blunt forced trauma to the head. It looks like the killer got her while she was going down the stairs.
<<if visited("pot") is true>>
-> It looks like the pot was the murder weapon.
    D: Maybe he got it from the kitchen, you should look there.
<<endif>>
